org.linchimin.efficient_trie

Class TrieNode<V>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.linchimin.efficient_trie.TrieNode<V>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<TrieNode<V>>

    public class TrieNode<V>
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<TrieNode<V>>
    a class for nodes of the trie graph
    Author:
    Lin Chi-Min (v381654729@gmail.com)

      character for this node, for debugging

      (package private) TrieNode<V>[] children
      the children nodes of this node
      (package private) int[] childrenIndices
      the children indices; children[childrenIndices[i]] where 0 <= i < numChildren is the ith children.
      private static java.lang.String DEFAULT_CHARS_STRING
      the default characters;
      (package private) boolean isKeyValueNode
      whether this node is a key-value node
      (package private) java.util.List<TrieNode<V>> KeyValueNodes 
      (package private) int level
      the level of root is 0, and the level of other nodes are 1, 2, 3, etc.
      (package private) int numChildren
      current number of children; the current offset at 'childrenIndices'
      (package private) TrieNode<V> parent
      the parent node of this node
      (package private) int score
      1. used to determine the most important descendant node of a node 2. only key-value nodes have a score; 3. can use word frequencies as score values
      (package private) V value
      a value stored in this node

        int score
        1. used to determine the most important descendant node of a node 2. only key-value nodes have a score; 3. can use word frequencies as score values

    • Method Detail

      • setSupportedChars

        public static void setSupportedChars(java.lang.String charsString)
        1. The default supported chars are "abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz0123456789"; 2. warning: words that contain one or more unsupported chars are automatically not added to a trie to check if all words are added, check trie.isAllAdded() to see if all characters are added; 3. Minimize the number of supported chars for speed optimization;
        Parameters:
        charsString - : like "abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz0123456789,.-_:'"
